analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and optimize this page to improve its load time and passing rate.
insights: The homepage has a load time of 875.69 ms, which is within the acceptable range. However, optimizing the homepage further can enhance user experience.
The blog page has the lowest load time (376 ms) among all pages, indicating efficient optimization. This can serve as a benchmark for optimizing other pages.
The pricing page has a slightly higher load time (374.1 ms) than the blog page, but it is still within the acceptable range. It can be further optimized to reduce the load time.

The TTFB for all pages is low, suggesting that the server is performing well. However, optimizing the content delivery network (CDN), caching, and server-side rendering can help reduce the load time for the "How It Works" page.
It is essential to prioritize fixing the issues on the "How It Works" page to ensure consistent performance across all pages.
